name: Nav Bharat Jagriti Kendra
briefDescription: NBJK (Nav Bharat Jagriti Kendra) has been founded by four engineering graduates, who deserted their job & comfortable lifestyles for establishing a “just” society, in which no one remain hungry, unemployed, illiterate, discriminated or exploited. Through this passion, NBJK was established by those engineers in the year 1971 with the initial support & guidance of great Gandhian leader Loknayak Jai Prakash Narayan. It has an integrated holistic approach of Rural Development and has been working of the issues of Health, Education, Livelihood, Small Group Support and Advocacy.NBJK has a team of 560 staffs and it is working in 10 districts of Bihar and Jharkhand reaching to about 100,000 poor and marginalised directly every year.
